Kakashi and Guy both attack their opponent with [[Dynamic Entry]]. Kakashi reveals his [[Sharingan]] and Guy opens the [[Eight Gates|Gate of Wonder]], after which the two simultaneously send out a giant-sized [[Lightning Release: Lightning Beast Tracking Fang]] and [[Daytime Tiger]]. Kakashi's technique envelops Guy's, and their combined form bites the opponent, resulting in an explosion.
